author: nigel
msg: HADOOP-3345. Enhance the hudson-test-patch target to cleanup messages, fix minor defects, and add eclipse plugin and python unit tests. Contributed by Nigel Daley.

author: mcfirst
msg: Applying the patch for HARMONY-5381 [buildtest][vts] arbitrary tests intermittently exit with code 0 instead of 104 (SUCCESS). Fixed static error message buffer to be dynamically allocated and freed.

author: lektran
msg: Added a method to strip comments when parsing java files, the artifact info stuff was getting a bit confused by them
